title: Home Cooked Meals And A Cheat Day: Here's What Shilpa Shetty's Diet Looks Like - News18
summary:
Shilpa Shetty's Diet: Emphasizing Home Cooked Meals and Cheat Days

Date: December 28, 2024 | Source: News18

Shilpa Shetty, a well-known figure in Bollywood, shares her approach to diet, emphasizing home-cooked meals and an enjoyable, balanced approach to eating.

  • She prefers simple, hearty meals and avoids restrictive diets.
  • Cheat days are included for indulging in favorites like desserts.
  • Breakfast includes aloe vera juice, porridge, and tea with brown sugar.
  • Lunch typically consists of brown rice or chapatti, dal, chicken curry, and vegetables.
  • Dinner includes a light meal of salad, soup, and chicken dish.
  • Maintains fitness through yoga and weight training.
“My day starts with aloe vera juice. It is great for your immune system; it’s great for your skin.” - Shilpa Shetty

Shilpa Shetty emphasizes the importance of home-cooked meals while incorporating a healthy lifestyle with her enjoyable eating habits.
newTitle: Shilpa Shetty's Diet: Emphasizing Home Cooked Meals and Cheat Days

In a tragic incident in Mumbai, a car driven by actress Urmila Kothare accidentally struck metro workers, resulting in the death of one individual. The event has raised concerns about road safety and the welfare of construction workers.

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: The Indian Express

Aman Gupta, co-founder of Boat and Shark Tank India judge, recently criticized a movie star known for his humble persona, calling him 'extremely egotistic'. Gupta made these remarks during a podcast interview while promoting the new season of Shark Tank India.

  • Gupta shared his experience working with an actor portrayed positively in the media as sweet and kind.
  • He highlighted the disparity between the actor's public image and his actual behavior during their collaboration.
  • He expressed his belief that people will eventually recognize the difference between genuine and pretentious personalities.

title: Marathi actor Urmila Kothare’s car runs over 2 workers in Kandivali; 1 killed - The Indian Express
summary:
Marathi actor Urmila Kothare’s car runs over 2 workers in Kandivali; 1 killed

Publication Date: Early Saturday morning

Source: Indian Express

In a tragic incident, Marathi actor Urmila Kothare’s vehicle struck two labourers working at a Metro construction site, resulting in one fatality and one injury.

  • The accident occurred around 12:45 AM near Poisar Metro station in Kandivali.
  • Kothare was reportedly heading home after dropping off a friend in Jogeshwari.
  • The driver has been booked for rash and negligent driving.
  • One labourer died at the scene, while the other was injured and is receiving treatment.
  • Both Kothare and her driver also sustained injuries.
“She had just wrapped up her shooting and was returning home when the incident took place,” a police officer said.

This incident raises concerns about road safety and the responsibilities of drivers.
newTitle: Tragic Accident Involving Marathi Actor Urmila Kothare in Kandivali

title: ‘It was horrible to work with Bipasha Basu and Karan Singh Grover, they demanded separate rooms’: Mika recalls producing web series - The Indian Express
summary:
Mika Singh Reflects on Challenging Experience with Bipasha Basu and Karan Singh Grover During Production

Published Date: December 2024 Source: The Indian Express

Mika Singh recounts his dire experience while producing the web series 'Dangerous', revealing challenges he faced working with actors Bipasha Basu and Karan Singh Grover.

  • Despite intentions to keep the project budget-friendly, Basu's insistence on joining Grover led to significant complications during shooting.
  • The project that was meant to take three months extended to six months, incurring heavy costs for Singh.
  • Issues included demands for separate accommodations and resistance to performing a previously agreed upon kissing scene.
  • Singh ultimately decided to cease producing films due to this problematic experience.
  • Both Salman Khan and Akshay Kumar advised Singh against pursuing production, predicting financial loss.
“It was the most horrible experience of my career.” - Mika Singh

In conclusion, Mika Singh's foray into film production serves as a cautionary tale about the unpredictability and potential turmoil of collaborating with established actors.
newTitle: Mika Singh Reflects on Challenging Experience with Bipasha Basu and Karan Singh Grover During Production

Publication Date: December 25, 2024 | Source: Bollywood Hungama

The film Baby John, starring Varun Dhawan, has had a disappointing start at the box office with collections dropping dramatically. As a result, many theaters have begun replacing its shows with the Hindi version of Marco.

  • Opening day collection: Rs. 11.25 crores.
  • Second day drop to Rs. 5.13 crores.
  • Predicted weekend collection could be under Rs. 30 crores.
  • The film's shows are being replaced by Marco, Pushpa 2, and Mufasa: The Lion King.
  • Only 4 out of 275 single-screen theaters in CP Berar are showing Baby John.

This situation raises concerns about distribution strategies and the future of films in theatrical releases as audiences clearly show preference for other titles.

summary:
Bombay Velvet’s Failure Still Haunts Amit Trivedi: 'It Shouldn’t Have Been This Bad'

Publication Date: December 28, 2024

Source: News18

In a recent interview, composer Amit Trivedi expressed deep regret over the failure of the film Bombay Velvet, despite putting in four years of hard work on its music.

  • The film, directed by Anurag Kashyap, starred Ranbir Kapoor and Anushka Sharma.
  • Trivedi shared that the film's massive failure was one of the lowest points of his career.
  • He struggled with feelings of hopelessness after the film's release and questioned his direction in life.
  • Despite the setback, Trivedi highlighted his efforts to integrate Jazz into Bollywood music through Bombay Velvet.
“Everything was a disaster. The film came and did not work. So horrible; it shouldn’t have been so bad.”

Trivedi is celebrated for his work in multiple hit films and has received a National Film Award for Best Music Director.

title: “Samay Raina won't follow brand guidelines, but delivers ROI” - afaqs!
summary:
Samay Raina's Unique Influence: Profits vs. Brand Guidelines

Publication Date: 2023-10-10   Source: Afaqs

In a recent commentary, Deepti Karthik reflects on her experience collaborating with comedian Samay Raina, highlighting the paradoxical nature of influencer marketing and its impact on sales despite brand guideline strife.

  • Karthik describes the influencer collaboration as their most profitable, generating over Rs. 25 lakh in two months despite initial negative sentiments.
  • Raina charged Rs. 5 lakh for the post but did not adhere closely to brand guidelines, leading to the post's removal.
  • Karthik suggests that Raina's use of dark humor may increase consumer engagement by provoking deeper thoughts about products.
  • This paradox demonstrates the complex dynamics of influencer marketing, where sales can occur despite contradictory brand messaging.
“Partner with Samay at your own risk concerning brand metrics, but I can assure you it will drive sales.”

This case highlights the ongoing debate among marketers regarding the trade-offs between brand safety and the potential for virality in influencer partnerships.
newTitle: Samay Raina's Unique Influence: Profits vs. Brand Guidelines

title: Kalki 2 can wait; For Deepika, daughter Dua is her first priority - 123telugu
summary:
Deepika Padukone Prioritizes Daughter Dua Over Film Projects

Published on Dec 28, 2024 2:00 pm IST

Bollywood actress Deepika Padukone emphasizes her commitment to her daughter Dua amid her busy career, stating that she is in no rush to resume filming the highly anticipated sequel, Kalki 2.

  • Deepika starred in the first part of Kalki 2898 AD and is expected to have a larger role in the sequel.
  • She prioritizes raising her daughter herself over returning to work, rejecting the idea of hiring a nanny.

  • The sequel is anticipated to release in theaters worldwide in 2026.
